fr.valhalla.jminer.Tile

Uses of Tile in fr.valhalla.jminer
 

Methods in fr.valhalla.jminer with parameters of type Tile
 void Plateau.checkMines(Tile t)
          Check all the mines around the given tile, and lock them if all the other tiles around them are revealed.
static boolean Tile.nextTo(Tile t1, Tile t2)
          Returns TRUE if the the tiles share a side or a corner (they are adjacent).
 void Plateau.revealAround(Tile t)
          Reveal all the tiles around the given tile if the following conditions are met: the tile must not be mined, already revealed, or have any mine around it.
